Uses of Interface
co.paralleluniverse.galaxy.cluster.NodeInfo

  • Packages that use NodeInfo 
    Package Description
    co.paralleluniverse.galaxy  
    co.paralleluniverse.galaxy.cluster  

    • Uses of NodeInfo in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy

      Methods in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy that return NodeInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NodeInfo Cluster.getMaster(short node)
      Returns a given node-group master if this node is a slave.
      NodeInfo Cluster.getMyMaster()
      Returns this node's master node if this is a slave.
      NodeInfo Cluster.getMyNodeInfo()
      Returns this cluster node's info.
      NodeInfo Cluster.getNodeInfoByName(String nodeName)
      Returns a NodeInfo for any cluster node, identified by its (unique) name.
      Methods in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy that return types with arguments of type NodeInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Collection<NodeInfo> Cluster.getMasters()
      Returns all the current, online master nodes.
      List<NodeInfo> Cluster.getMySlaves()
      Returns this node's master node if this is a slave.
      Set<NodeInfo> Cluster.getNodesByProperty(String propertyName, Object value)
      Returns a set of NodeInfo for any cluster node, with a property equal to the given value.
      Methods in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy with parameters of type NodeInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Cluster.isMaster(NodeInfo node)
      Returns true if the given node is a master; false if it's a slave.

    • Uses of NodeInfo in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy.cluster

      Methods in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy.cluster that return NodeInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NodeInfo SlaveAddressResolver.getNode(Address address) 
      Methods in co.paralleluniverse.galaxy.cluster with parameters of type NodeInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract Address AbstractNodeAddressResolver.getAddress(NodeInfo node) 
      void SlaveConfigurationListener.newMaster(NodeInfo node)
      Invoked when this (slave) node has got a new master.
      void NodePropertyListener.propertyChanged(NodeInfo node, String property, Object value)
      Invoked when the node's property has been added, changed or removed.
      void SlaveConfigurationListener.slaveAdded(NodeInfo node)
      Invoked when a new slave was added to this (master) node's group.
      void SlaveConfigurationListener.slaveRemoved(NodeInfo node)
      Invoked when a slave has left this (master) node's group (it's gone offline).
